DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare relative efficacy safety test formulation Imiquimod 3.75 % Topical Cream market formulation Zyclara® ( imiquimod ) 3.75 % Topical Cream treatment actinic keratosis . Both test reference formulation also compare placebo cream test superiority .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Evaluate Bioequivalence Two Imiquimod Cream 3.75 % Formulations Patients With Actinic Keratosis .
